title: Kettavano Lyrics 7UP Madras Gig Album Songs
stanzas:
un nenjil konjam
vazha idam vendum
kanavilum ninaivilum

en kaalam neelum
thooram vara vendum
pagalilim iravilum

megam kooda
mazhaiyaai pozhindhaale
eeram thanthaal

nee nallavalo
naan kettavano
naan ennai kettene

dhegam vaada
yedho seithaale
arugil vandhaal

thuli podhaiyile
naan vaadaiyile
naan unnai kandene

un nenjil konjam
vazha idam vendum
kanavilum ninaivilum

uyurai thaeda
idhayam nulaindhale
eduthu sendraal

Kaalam oada
naanam kondraale
ninaivil nindraale.

nee nallavalo
naan kettavano
naan ennai kettene

thuli podhaiyile
naan vaadaiyile
naan unnai kandene

Ennai yeno
Theendi sendraal (3)

megam kooda
mazhaiyaai pozhindhaale
eeram thanthaal

dhegam vaada
yedho seithaale
arugil vandhaal

naan kettavano
naan ennai kettene
